rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Numero del vértice
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: número

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva que define una concavidad del terreno cada 20 m.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: depresión genérica

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 latitude of a SpatialThing (decimal degrees).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: latitude

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva que define una concavidad del terreno cada 100 m.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: depresión maestra

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Se define como puntos acotados a aquellos puntos con cota que poseen una ubicación representativa del relieve y complementan la información facilitada por las curvas de nivel.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PuntoAcotado

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Se representan como curvas de nivel aquellas líneas que tienen la misma altitud sobre la superficie de referencia, siendo esta altitud un múltiplo de 40 o un múltiplo de 100 (para líneas interpoladas).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CurvaDeNivel

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Perteneciente a la Red de Regente
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VerticeGeodesicoRegente

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Paso entre montañas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PuertoDeMontanna

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Elevación de tierra aislada y de menor altura que el monte o la montaña.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Cerro

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ontología global de dominio sobre fenómenos topográficos y geodesia
rdf:Description.dc:title: geodesyOntology
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Lissete Moscoso León

rdf:Description.dc:title: WGS84 Geo Positioning: an RDF vocabulary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Recent changes to this namespace: $Log: wgs84_pos.rdf,v $ Revision 1.22 2009/04/20 15:00:30 timbl Remove the time bits which have been deal with elsewhere eg in iCal.
Revision 1.21 2009/04/20 12:52:47 timbl try again
Revision 1.20 2009/04/20 12:42:11 timbl Add Event (edited ages ago and never checked in), and location (following discussion http://chatlogs.planetrdf.com/swig/2009-04-20#T12-36-09)
Revision 1.19 2009/04/20 12:36:31 timbl Add Event (edited ages ago and never checked in), and location (following discussion http://chatlogs.planetrdf.com/swig/2009-04-20#T12-36-09)
Revision 1.18 2006/02/01 22:01:04 danbri Clarified that lat and long are decimal degrees, and that alt is decimal metres about local reference ellipsoid
Revision 1.17 2004/02/06 17:38:12 danbri Fixed a bad commit screwup
Revision 1.15 2003/04/19 11:24:08 danbri Fixed the typo even more.
Revision 1.14 2003/04/19 11:16:56 danbri fixed a typo
Revision 1.13 2003/02/19 22:27:27 connolly relaxed domain constraints on lat/long/alt from Point to SpatialThing
Revision 1.12 2003/01/12 01:41:41 danbri Trying local copy of XSLT doc.
Revision 1.11 2003/01/12 01:20:18 danbri added a link to morten's xslt rdfs viewer.
Revision 1.10 2003/01/11 18:56:49 danbri Removed datatype range from lat and long properties, since they would have required each occurance of the property to mention the datatype.
Revision 1.9 2003/01/11 11:41:31 danbri Another typo; repaired rdfs:Property to rdf:Property x4
Revision 1.8 2003/01/11 11:05:02 danbri Added an rdfs:range for each lat/long/alt property, http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#float
Revision 1.7 2003/01/10 20:25:16 danbri Longer rdfs:comment for Point, trying to be Earth-centric and neutral about coordinate system(s) at the same time. Feedback welcomed.
Revision 1.6 2003/01/10 20:18:30 danbri Added CVS log comments into the RDF/XML as an rdfs:comment property of the vocabulary. Note that this is not common practice (but seems both harmless and potentially useful).
revision 1.5 date: 2003/01/10 20:14:31; author: danbri; state: Exp; lines: +16 -5 Updated schema: Added a dc:date, added url for more info. Changed the rdfs:label of the namespace from gp to geo. Added a class Point, set as the rdfs:domain of each property. Added XML comment on the lat_long property suggesting that we might not need it (based on #rdfig commentary from implementors).
revision 1.4 date: 2003/01/10 20:01:07; author: danbri; state: Exp; lines: +6 -5 Fixed typo; several rdfs:about attributes are now rdf:about. Thanks to MortenF in #rdfig for catching this error.
revision 1.3 date: 2003/01/10 11:59:03; author: danbri; state: Exp; lines: +4 -3 fixed buglet in vocab, added more wgs links
revision 1.2 date: 2003/01/10 11:01:11; author: danbri; state: Exp; lines: +4 -4 Removed alt from the as-a-flat-string property, and switched from space separated to comma separated.
revision 1.1 date: 2003/01/10 10:53:23; author: danbri; state: Exp; basic geo vocab
rdf:Description.dc:description: A vocabulary for representing latitude, longitude and altitude information in the WGS84 geodetic reference datum. Version $Id: wgs84_pos.rdf,v 1.22 2009/04/20 15:00:30 timbl Exp $. See http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/ for more details.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geo

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Cota Municipal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CotaMunicipal

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Conjunto de particularidades que presenta un terreno en su configuración superficial.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fenomeno Topográfico

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Código de estación GPS
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: codigo

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Perteneciente a la Red de Orden Inferior
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VerticeGeodesicoDeOrdenInferior

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vértice geodésico perteneciente a la Red de Primer Orden (NPRO) o a la Red de Orden Inferior (ROI) de España.
rdf:Description.terms:source: Anexo A: Catálogo de Objetos Geográficos de BTN100.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VerticeGeodesico

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Coordenada Y en metros (ETRS89)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: yETRS89

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Huso UTM.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: huso

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment:
Uniquely identified by lat/long/alt. i.e.
spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2) :- lat(P1, LAT), long(P1, LONG), alt(P1, ALT), lat(P2, LAT), long(P2, LONG), alt(P2, ALT).
sameThing(P1, P2) :- type(P1, Point), type(P2, Point), spaciallyIntersects(P1, P2).
A point, typically described using a coordinate system relative to Earth, such as WGS84.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: point

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Altitud expresada en metros
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cota

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva de nivel con altitud múltiplo de 100 m.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: curva de nivel maestra

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva de nivel con altitud cada 20 m.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: curva de nivel genérica

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Vértices de la Red de Estaciones Permanentes de GPS, de la que se pueden obtener valores de observación para un día concreto y una hora determinada.
rdf:Description.terms:source: Anexo A: Catálogo de Objetos Geográficos de BTN100.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: EstacionPermanenteGPS

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva con altitud resultado de un algoritmo de cálculo y no de los datos del terreno.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: curva de nivel interpolada

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva de nivel en superficie.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CurvaDeNivelAltimetrica

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: skos para categoria de curva de nivel. Puede tomar los valores: * http://geo.linkeddata.es/kos/geodesy/categoriaDeCurvaDeNivel/curvaDeNivelGenerica * http://geo.linkeddata.es/kos/geodesy/categoriaDeCurvaDeNivel/CurvaDeNivelInterpolada * http://geo.linkeddata.es/kos/geodesy/categoriaDeCurvaDeNivel/CurvaDeNivelMaestra * http://geo.linkeddata.es/kos/geodesy/categoriaDeCurvaDeNivel/depresionGenerica * http://geo.linkeddata.es/kos/geodesy/categoriaDeCurvaDeNivel/depresionMaestra

The relation between something and the point, or other geometrical thing in space, where it is. For example, the realtionship between a radio tower and a Point with a given lat and long. Or a relationship between a park and its outline as a closed arc of points, or a road and its location as a arc (a sequence of points). Clearly in practice there will be limit to the accuracy of any such statement, but one would expect an accuracy appropriate for the size of the object and uses such as mapping .
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: location

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Paso o depresión suave por donde se puede atravesar con facilidad de un lado a otro una montaña o sierra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Collado

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Anything with spatial extent, i.e. size, shape, or position. e.g. people, places, bowling balls, as well as abstract areas like cubes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SpatialThing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 altitude of a SpatialThing (decimal meters above the local reference ellipsoid).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: altitude

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Categoría asociada a cada tipología definida.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: categoría de curva de nivel

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Altitud Elipsoidal
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: altitudElipsoidal

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A comma-separated representation of a latitude, longitude coordinate.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lat/long

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Curva de nivel submarina.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CurvaDeNivelBatimetrica

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The WGS84 longitude of a SpatialThing (decimal degrees).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: longitude

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Altitud orotométrica
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: altitudOrtometrica

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Coordenada X en metros (ETRS89)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: xETRS89

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Montaña de cumbre puntiaguda
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pico

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Perteneciente a REGCAN95
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VerticeGeodesicoRegcan95
